text: The Putrajaya International Convention Centre (PICC) is in Putrajaya, Malaysia. It covers 135,000 square meters and was built between 2001 and 2003. Designed by former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad, it looks like a Malay royal belt buckle. It was renamed in October 2004 to be on par with major conference centers in cities like London, Tokyo, and Paris. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Malaysia Category:Putrajaya
title: Putrajaya International Convention Centre
